Package CADI.Server.Core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeliveryManager
    This class is addressed to send the response to a client.
    ProcessWOI  
    ResponseData
    This class is used
    Scheduler
    This class performs the control of the listener/s and workers threads.
    TasksQueue
    This class implements a queue where the works to be done by a thread are saved by the Scheduler.
    TasksQueueNode
    This is an auxiliary class used to save the tasks that will be done by a Worker thread.
    Worker
    This class performs the client request processing and it sends the server response to the client.
